chapter.para: This example is a JAIN SLEE application which illustrates how SBBs can access persistent storage.
It is moderatly complicated example. SLEE code is very simple, however there are parts that need some extra knowledge. To fully undertand this example, you need following knowledge:
Example service performs basic CRUD operations once its started. To be precise it creates table, inserts value, queries table and once done, it drops the table from database.
All this is achieved with asynchronous JDBC RA.
